basic.name: Group 1: Basic
basic.purpose: Verify core matching logic works correctly for standard cases

intermediate.name: Group 2: Intermediate
intermediate.purpose: Verify unit conversions, format variations, and normalization logic

advanced.name: Group 3: Advanced (Real-world Conditions)
advanced.description: AI-generated images with challenging real-world conditions

composite.name: Group 4: Composite (Controlled Real-world)
composite.description: HTML labels composited onto bottle templates with effects

stress.name: Group 5: Stress Tests
stress.description: Edge cases for numeric parsing, unicode, complex addresses, and warning validation

labels.description: Perfect match - all fields correct (happy path)

applicationData.governmentWarning: GOVERNMENT WARNING: (1) According to the Surgeon General, women should not drink alcoholic beverages during pregnancy because of the risk of birth defects. (2) Consumption of alcoholic beverages impairs your ability to drive a car or operate machinery, and may cause health problems.

labels.description: Dave scenario - brand name case mismatch (STONE'S THROW vs Stone's Throw)
labels.expectedReason: Fuzzy match handles case difference after normalization

applicationData.governmentWarning: GOVERNMENT WARNING: (1) According to the Surgeon General, women should not drink alcoholic beverages during pregnancy because of the risk of birth defects. (2) Consumption of alcoholic beverages impairs your ability to drive a car or operate machinery, and may cause health problems.

labels.description: ABV mismatch - label shows 14.5% but application has 13.5%
labels.expectedReason: Numeric mismatch on ABV (1% difference)

applicationData.governmentWarning: GOVERNMENT WARNING: (1) According to the Surgeon General, women should not drink alcoholic beverages during pregnancy because of the risk of birth defects. (2) Consumption of alcoholic beverages impairs your ability to drive a car or operate machinery, and may cause health problems.

labels.description: Jenny scenario - Government Warning in title case instead of ALL CAPS
labels.expectedReason: Header format violation - must be ALL CAPS per 27 CFR Part 16
